block_comment: This block of code is designed to create a pipeline of register elements that implement a delay mechanism for the "cmp_data" signal, running on a rising edge clock "clk_i". Once the rising edge of the clock signal triggers, the data contained in "cmp_data" is passed along this chain of registers, each representing a delay stage whose delay value is represented by "#TCQ". Thus, the "cmp_data" signal gets delayed consecutively and its value is stored in "cmp_data_r", "cmp_data_r2", "cmp_data_r3", and "cmp_data_r4" respectively.
